abstract.p: Correction of Sept 20 article on Vatican reassignments; authors of article mentioned are Rev Jon D Fuller and Rev James F Keenan (S)

block.p: An article on Wednesday about reassignments at the Vatican misspelled the given name of one co-author of an article in the Jesuit magazine America that suggested that the Vatican was growing more tolerant about the use of condoms to combat the spread of AIDS, and misspelled the surname of the other. The authors are the Rev. Jon D. Fuller (not John) and the Rev. James F. Keenan (not Keegan).

The authors are the Rev. Jon D. Fuller (not John) and the Rev. James F. Keenan (not Keegan).
